messages.message: Failed to converge on a amount of shielding.
Select quantity you would like to compute on the left
Select quantity you would like to compute above
Dose values computed using ANSI/ANS-6.1.1-1991 most conservative case: Anterior-Posterior orientation. Dose calculations are a rough guide, at best, and are subject to many uncertainties or errors.
Neutron dose calc not implemented yet.

Distance from center of source to face of detector. Number must be" " followed by units; valid units are: meters, m, cm, mm, km, feet," " ft, ', in, inches, or \". You may also add multiple distances," " such as '3ft 4in', or '3.6E-2 m 12 cm' which are equivalent to " " 40inches and 15.6cm respectively.
Do not trust results of this calculator utility Please email interspec@sandia.gov this error message and include your device type and model (e.g., iPad pro, Windows 10 Dell laptop, etc.)
Error calculating dose, invalid shielding, sorry :{
Error calculating dose from source, sorry :{
Failed to find lower bounding distance, at {1} cm.
Failed to find upper bounding distance, at {1} cm.
Couldn't find distance; exceeded max iterations.
Error calculating dose while searching for distance, sorry :{
You must enter the atomic number of the shielding material.
You must enter the shielding material type.
Warning: Bremsstrahlung of beta decays not accounted for, results may not be trustworthy.
No numerical value entered for dose
